医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
橄榄球对青少年大脑结构和功能的影响研究人员调查了青少年足球运动员的大脑结构和神经生理学特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/The-impact-of-tackle-football-on-adolescent-brain-struct-and-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/The-impact-of-tackle-football-on-adolescent-brain-struct-and-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8424f45f-5389-41dd-972b-b2a34b40bbe8 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 08:40:00 -0500 The impact of tackle football on adolescent brain structure and function
COVID-19 对早期教育的影响：回顾性研究显示幼儿园准备程度下降一项新研究探讨了学区早期幼儿园准备评估 (KRA) 与电子健康记录 (EHR) 数据之间的关联，并将 KRA 分数与 COVID-19 大流行期间发生的变化联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/COVID-19s-impact-on-early-education-Retrospective-study-shows-decrease-in-kindergarten-readiness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/COVID-19s-impact-on-early-education-Retrospective-study-shows-decrease-in-kindergarten-readiness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b8caf36-14cd-4447-8f38-e3f2ea7ba1b9 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 07:48:00 -0500 COVID-19's impact on early education: Retrospective study shows decrease in kindergarten readiness

体力活动与认知能力下降有关吗？研究人员研究了体育锻炼和认知能力下降之间的联系，研究了特定领域和整体认知，并研究了剂量反应关联和潜在的调节因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Is-physical-activity-linked-with-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Is-physical-activity-linked-with-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=206efc92-41d2-43b1-b02c-b8deb943af61 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 06:38:00 -0500 Is physical activity associated with cognitive decline?
使用气体燃料进行家庭烹饪和取暖对健康的影响研究人员检查了各国使用气体燃料取暖和烹饪对健康影响的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/The-health-effects-of-using-gaseous-fuels-for-household-cooking-and-heating.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/The-health-effects-of-using-gaseous-fuels-for-household-cooking-and-heating.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80bf3d24-0982-43c8-92d1-3723fdc9fb1e Tue, 06 Feb 2024 06:16:00 -0500 The health effects of using gaseous fuels for household cooking and heating
长效新冠病毒与其他病毒感染后综合征有何不同？ 20 岁以下儿童和青少年病毒后病症的症状、病程、长期临床特征以及可能的医疗负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/How-is-long-COVID- Different-from-other-post-viral-infection-syndromes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/How-is-long-COVID- Different-from-other-post-viral-infection-syndromes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd998bd8-0564-4e8e-8cf3-2656292f6601 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 06:13:00 -0500 How is long-COVID different from other post-viral infection syndromes?
非酒精性脂肪肝患者可能受益于增加膳食烟酸摄入量饮食中较高的烟酸摄入量是否会降低全因、心脑血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Patients-with-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease-may-benefit-from-increased-dietary-niacin-intake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Patients-with-non-酒精-fatty-liver-disease-may-benefit-from-increased-dietary-niacin-intake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53c21f6a-87b2-4055-a792-7c984343269e Tue, 06 Feb 2024 05:06:00 -0500 Patients with non-alcoholic fatty liver disease may benefit from increased dietary niacin intake

您的饮食是否会增加尿路感染复发的风险？饮食、体重和生活方式等行为危险因素对泌尿道感染患病率的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Does-your-diet-increase-the-risk-of-recurring-urinary-tract-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Does-your-diet-increase-the-risk-of-recurring-urinary-tract-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab60065b-8308-4184-a4ea-f47e5ed0ad77 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 03:50:00 -0500 Does your diet increase the risk of recurring urinary tract infections?
在轻度认知障碍研究中石榴籽油可增强大脑功能研究表明，石榴籽油 (PSO) 与地中海饮食 (MeDi) 相结合可显着增强轻度认知障碍 (MCI) 个体的认知功能，表明 PSO 作为认知健康的潜在自然干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Pomegranate-seed-oil-boosts-brain-function-in-mild-cognitive-impairment-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240205/Pomegranate-seed-oil-boosts-brain-function-in-mild-cognitive-impairment-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd12b760-642c-4323-8162-fb7d4a095b83 Mon, 05 Feb 2024 23:32:00 -0500 Pomegranate seed oil boosts brain function in mild cognitive impairment study
